    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(android.app.Activity activity,
                              String gameId,
                              IUnityAdsListener listener)
        Initializes Unity Ads. Unity Ads should be initialized when app starts.
        Parameters:
        activity - Current Android activity of calling app
        gameId - Unique identifier for a game, given by Unity Ads admin tools or Unity editor
        listener - Listener for IUnityAdsListener callbacks

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(android.app.Activity activity,
                              String gameId,
                              IUnityAdsListener listener,
                              boolean testMode)
        Initializes Unity Ads. Unity Ads should be initialized when app starts.
        Parameters:
        activity - Current Android activity of calling app
        gameId - Unique identifier for a game, given by Unity Ads admin tools or Unity editor
        listener - Listener for IUnityAdsListener callbacks
        testMode - If true, only test ads are shown

      • isInitialized

        public static boolean isInitialized()
        Checks if Unity Ads has been initialized. This might be useful for debugging initialization problems.
        Returns:
        If true, Unity Ads has been successfully initialized

      • setListener

        public static void setListener(IUnityAdsListener listener)
        Change listener for IUnityAdsListener callbacks
        Parameters:
        listener - New listener for IUnityAdsListener callbacks

      • getListener

        public static IUnityAdsListener getListener()
        Get current listener for IUnityAdsListener callbacks
        Returns:
        Current listener for IUnityAdsListener callbacks

      • isSupported

        public static boolean isSupported()
        Checks if current device supports running Unity Ads
        Returns:
        If true, device supports Unity Ads. If false, device can't initialize or show Unity Ads.

      • getVersion

        public static String getVersion()
        Get current SDK version
        Returns:
        Current SDK version name

      • isReady

        public static boolean isReady()
        Check if default placement is ready to show ads
        Returns:
        If true, default placement is ready to show ads

      • isReady

        public static boolean isReady(String placementId)
        Check if placement is ready to show ads
        Parameters:
        placementId - Placement, as defined in Unity Ads admin tools
        Returns:
        If true, placement is ready to show ads

      • getPlacementState

        public static UnityAds.PlacementState getPlacementState()
        Get current state of default placement
        Returns:
        If PlacementState.READY, default placement is ready to show ads. Other states give detailed reasons why placement is not ready.

      • getPlacementState

        public static UnityAds.PlacementState getPlacementState(String placementId)
        Get current state of a placement
        Parameters:
        placementId - Placement, as defined in Unity Ads admin tools
        Returns:
        If PlacementState.READY, placement is ready to show ads. Other states give detailed reasons why placement is not ready.

      • show

        public static void show(android.app.Activity activity)
        Show one advertisement using default placement.
        Parameters:
        activity - Current Android activity of calling app

      • show

        public static void show(android.app.Activity activity,
                        String placementId)
        Show one advertisement with custom placement.
        Parameters:
        activity - Current Android activity of calling app
        placementId - Placement, as defined in Unity Ads admin tools

      • setDebugMode

        public static void setDebugMode(boolean debugMode)
        Toggles debug mode on/off
        Parameters:
        debugMode - If true, debug mode is on and there will be lots of debug output from Unity Ads. If false, there will be only some short log messages from Unity Ads.

      • getDebugMode

        public static boolean getDebugMode()
        Get current debug mode status
        Returns:
        If true, debug mode is on. If false, debug mode is off.
